text: Charles Stanley Monck, 4th Viscount MonckGCMG PC (10 October 1819 – 29 November 1894) was an Irish politician who served as the last governor-general of the Province of Canada and the first Governor General of Canada after Canadian Confederation. Category:1819 births Category:1894 deaths Category:Members of the Privy Council of the United Kingdom Category:Governors-general of Canada Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:UK MPs 1852–1857
title: Charles Monck, 4th Viscount Monck
